author: Janelle Griffith
title: Mayor Bill de Blasio says New York City is in desperate need of surgical gowns
description: Mayor Bill de Blasio on Monday said New York City is in desperate need of surgical gowns.
content:
Mayor Bill de Blasio said Monday that New York City is in desperate need of surgical gowns.
De Blasio said the city did not have enough gowns to get through the week. 
"I am making an appeal to the federal government," de Blasio said at a news conference. "… [+7567 chars]
